tool_description: Yura Fxcloud is a Audio Sharing Platform, Yura Fxcloud is the best way to start your own audiosharing !
name: Yura RAPI
title: Yura RAPI

api_list.name: end 1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yura-rapi.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yura-rapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yura-rapi.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yura-rapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
